title: Listicles are fun!
about: This is a demo listicle. Just playing around. Dave
items: This station will conduct a test.
Had this been an actual listicle.
PS: Doesn't Walt Whitman look great as the background image of a listicle?

PPS: I just added the ability to use Emoji cheat sheet codes in listicle entries.

So here's a nice :kiss: for you!

Coooooool!

PPPS: Andy Seidl noticed that the saved prefs for two listicles on the same domain will collide. So I made a change that saves the prefs based on the URL of the listicle. Thanks for the clue Andy! :-)
